mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B, CM_USER U WHERE B.REG_ID = U.USER_ID

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B, CM_USER U WHERE B.REG_ID = U.USER_ID(+) ) AS TOTCNT, Y.RNUM, Y.SEQ, Y.TITLE, Y.CONTENTS, Y.REG_ID, TO_CHAR(Y.REG_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS REG_DATE, Y.MOD_ID, Y.MOD_DATE, Y.REG_NM FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, X.SEQ, X.TITLE, X.CONTENTS, X.REG_ID, X.REG_DATE, X.MOD_ID, X.MOD_DATE, REG_NM FROM( SELECT B.SEQ, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.REG_ID, B.REG_DATE, B.MOD_ID, B.MOD_DATE, U.USER_NM AS REG_NM FROM BOARD B, CM_USER U WHERE B.REG_ID = U.USER_ID(+)
ORDER BY SEQ DESC)X WHERE ROWNUM <= #{MAXROWNUM} )Y WHERE Y.RNUM >=#{MINROWNUM}
SELECT A.SEQ, A.TITLE, A.CONTENTS, A.REG_ID, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') REG_DATE, A.MOD_DATE, B.USER_NM AS REG_NM FROM BOARD A, CM_USER B WHERE A.REG_ID = B.USER_ID AND SEQ = #{SEQ}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO BOARD (SEQ,TITLE,CONTENTS,REG_ID,REG_DATE,MOD_DATE) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(SEQ)+1 FROM BOARD),#{TITLE},#{CONTENTS},#{REGID},SYSDATE,SYSDATE)
